citations.narrative:
In the hay shed, a couple of transport crates were stored on top of the hay bales to be fed out to animals and rusty tools
were stored on top of the straw bedding bales. Improper storage of food and bedding may cause the supplies to
deteriorate. Supplies of food and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against
deterioration, molding, or contamination by vermin. Refrigeration shall be provided for supplies of perishable food.
Correct by 31 January 2025.

A dead rat was observed on the pathway to the animal pen. The licensee stated there is a pest control program in place
that consists of live traps, snap traps and bait for mammalian pests. An insufficiently effective pest control program may
allow pests to cause damage to facilities, bedding and feed. It may also allow transfer of illnesses to regulated animals. A
safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be established
and maintained.
Correct by 19 February 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In the hay shed, a couple of transport crates were stored on top of the hay bales to be fed out to animals and rusty tools 
were stored on top of the straw bedding bales. Improper storage of food and bedding may cause the supplies to 
deteriorate. Supplies of food and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against 
deterioration, molding, or contamination by vermin. Refrigeration shall be provided for supplies of perishable food. 
 
Correct by 31 January 2025. 
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
A dead rat was observed on the pathway to the animal pen. The licensee stated there is a pest control program in place 
that consists of live traps, snap traps and bait for mammalian pests. An insufficiently effective pest control program may 
allow pests to cause damage to facilities, bedding and feed. It may also allow transfer of illnesses to regulated animals. A 
safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be established 
and maintained.  
 
Correct by 19 February 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
